column4: BRIEF-Tortoise Energy Infrastructure Corp Provides Unaudited Balance Sheet Information And Asset Coverage Ratio Update
column6: * TORTOISE ENERGY INFRASTRUCTURE CORP. PROVIDES UNAUDITED BALANCE SHEET INFORMATION AND ASSET COVERAGE RATIO UPDATE AS OF APRIL 30, 2018
column7: * TORTOISE ENERGY INFRASTRUCTURE CORP - AS OF APRIL 30, 2018, UNAUDITED TOTAL ASSETS WERE ABOUT $2.2 BILLION AND ITS UNAUDITED NET ASSET VALUE WAS $1.3 BILLION Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
